pageProps.content:
Experience

The Oberoi Mauritius is an elegant beach-front resort located in Turtle Bay on the northwest coast of the island.
This elegant resort offers a refined experience with discreet service & its well-designed open-air public areas offer jaw-dropping views of the Indian Ocean.
Set in 20-acres of gorgeous, sub-tropical gardens with views over a long stretch of white, sand beach & crystal-clear water, The Oberoi offers only the best in barefoot luxury.
Unique to The Oberoi, guests can experience their complimentary ‘Touching Senses’ Programme of daily activities that are expertly curated to rejuvenate & relax. These include special breathing exercises, sculpture classes or guided nature walks.

Stay

Accommodation comprises luxury pavilions or villas, some with garden views & others with ocean views & private pools.
Resort facilities include a spa, fully equipped gym, outdoor swimming pool, steam room, library, tennis courts & a nearby golf course.
A variety of dining options are available at The Oberoi, including restaurant dining at one of the resort’s restaurants or al fresco dining under the stars.

Activities

The Oberoi Mauritius offers a range of island activities, including scuba diving, snorkelling, windsurfing & waterskiing as well as cooking courses, sculpture classes or guided nature walks.
Relaxing spa treatments can also be booked.
A highlight is taking part in their complimentary ‘Touching Senses’ Programme, designed to help guests relax & decompress.

subfolders.title: Cannonier Beachcomber Golf Resort & Spa
subfolders.description: On the northwest coast of Mauritius, Cannonier Beachcomber Golf Resort & Spa boasts an ideal ocean-front setting where gorgeous sunsets & palm trees complete this island paradise. Cannonier is in its own category of paradise.  The resort is perched on a peninsula with 2 separate beaches, each offering a different view & atmosphere.

subfolders.title: Constance Belle Mare Plage
subfolders.description: On the east coast of Mauritius, Constance Belle Mare Plage is set in tropical gardens overlooking a long, sandy beach. Enclose by a coral reef, the beach is ideal for swimming & snorkelling, so everyone - from children to older guests - enjoy the safe, warm water of the Indian Ocean.

subfolders.title: Constance Prince Maurice
subfolders.description: Surrounded by sandy beaches & tropical gardens & set on its own isolated peninsula on the east coast, Constance Prince Maurice is the only Mauritian resort that is built on stilts. The resort offers a range of water sports, so adventurous guests will have their pick.  Prince Maurice also features a one-of-a-kind floating bar & a heated lap pool for those who wish to stay active.

subfolders.title: Dinarobin Beachcomber Golf Resort & Spa
subfolders.description: Dinarobin Beachcomber Golf Resort & Spa has one of the most stunning locations in Mauritius.   Situated at the foot of Le Morne mountain on the southwest coast of the island, Dinarobin’s guests will be enveloped in nature.

subfolders.title: LUX Belle Mare
subfolders.description: Overlooking a turquoise lagoon on Belle Mare beach on Mauritius’ east coast, lies the family-friendly LUX Belle Mare. The lagoon is a drawing card for water sport enthusiasts & avid swimmers, while the long stretch of white, sandy beach in front of the resort is dotted with thatched umbrellas.

subfolders.title: LUX Le Morne
subfolders.description: LUX Le Morne is a luxury resort set in a beautiful, protected bay along the Le Morne peninsula lagoon on the southwest coast of Mauritius. Surrounded by lush, tropical gardens & spectacular views of the ocean, Le Morne is the ideal retreat for an idyllic island getaway.

subfolders.title: Mauricia Beachcomber Resort & Spa
subfolders.description: Mauricia Beachcomber Resort & Spa is known for its excellent location.  Situated in the heart of Grand Baie on Mauritius’ northwest coast, the resort boasts a unique, tropical island setting.   The smart-casual character of Mauricia Beachcomber blends high-quality accommodation with superb service.

subfolders.title: One & Only Le Saint Geran
subfolders.description: The One & Only Le Saint Geran offers elite island luxury on the east coast of Mauritius, with exclusive access to an endless ocean, blue lagoon & white, sandy beaches. This resort is deserving of its status as a “Leading Hotel of the World.”  Here, attention to detail is paramount - a personal butler will see to your daily requirements & ensure you are relaxed throughout your stay.

subfolders.title: Paradis Beachcomber Golf Resort & Spa
subfolders.description: Paradis Beachcomber Golf Resort & Spa is one of the most prestigious hotels in Mauritius.   Located on a stunning peninsula, on the southwest coast of the island, Paradis is renowned for its ideal setting, pristine beach & exceptional range of facilities & activities.

subfolders.title: Paradise Cove Boutique Hotel
subfolders.description: As one of Mauritius best honeymoon resorts, the adults-only Paradise Cove Boutique Hotel is situated on the north coast at Anse la Raie & is the perfect island retreat for honeymooners or couples. Everything about this resort is luxurious & romantic.  From the pristine shores of the lagoon, the beautiful infinity pool & relaxing wellness spa to the glorious Indian Ocean sunsets relished from the beach or boat.

subfolders.title: Royal Palm Beachcomber
subfolders.description: The Royal Palm, as the name suggests is undeniably one of the finest resorts in the Indian Ocean.   Located on the protected northwest coast of Mauritius, this exclusive resort offers luxurious sea-facing suites, service of the highest standard & superb cuisine.

subfolders.title: Shandrani Beachcomber Resort & Spa
subfolders.description: Shandrani Beachcomber has a unique location on the southeast coast of Mauritius on its own peninsula, lapped by the Blue Bay Marine Park & its rich sea life. Hugged by three beaches, Shandrani is the first choice for action-filled holidays & nature lovers. This luxurious all-inclusive resort also includes a Sailing Club & Dive Centre for water sport enthusiasts.

subfolders.title: Shanti Maurice Resort & Spa
subfolders.description: Shanti Maurice Resort & Spa boasts a secluded setting on 36-acres of exclusive land on the south coast of Mauritius. Situated on one of the best beaches in Mauritius, Shanti Maurice is passionate about keeping the area peaceful & tranquil.  No motorized watersports are allowed on this pristine beach, so guests can anticipate a rejuvenating & relaxing island experience.

subfolders.title: The Oberoi Mauritius
subfolders.description: The Oberoi Mauritius is an elegant beach-front resort located in Turtle Bay on the northwest coast of the island. This elegant resort offers a refined experience with discreet service & its well-designed open-air public areas offer jaw-dropping views of the Indian Ocean.

subfolders.title: The St Regis Mauritius Resort
subfolders.description: The St Regis Mauritius boasts an ideal beachfront setting on the southwest coast on the turquoise shores of Le Morne Beach, one of Mauritius’ most beautiful coastlines & a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Offering the perfect blend between relaxed island life & 5-star luxury, The St Regis is an ideal choice for honeymooners, couples or romantics looking for only the best in barefoot luxury.

subfolders.title: Trou aux Biches Beachcomber Golf Resort & Spa
subfolders.description: Located on one of the finest resort sites on the island, Trou aux Biches unfolds its magnificent suites & villas along 2km of beach on the northwest coast of Mauritius. Trou aux Biches Beachcomber has undergone a R1 billion re-vamp, unmatched anywhere in Mauritius, ensuring that they are always at the forefront of the luxury resort industry.

subfolders.title: Victoria Beachcomber Resort & Spa
subfolders.description: Breathtakingly beautiful, Victoria Beachcomber Resort & Spa enjoys a quiet location on the northwest coast of Mauritius.   Diving & snorkelling are exceptional at Victoria Beachcomber.  The resort’s award-winning diving academy is found on the beach itself, only 5 meters from the water’s edge & is very close to some of Mauritius’ most magnificent dives sites.

whatWeLoveItems: Open-air public areas with glorious ocean views
Set in 20-acres of lush, tropical gardens
